unittitle_ssm: Kenneth P. Neilson Collection on Frederic Ewen
abstract_ssm: Kenneth P. Neilsen is an educator, artist, composer, publisher and author, and friend of Frederic Ewen. Ewen (1899-1989) was a professor of English from Brooklyn College who was forced to resign in 1952 because of his progressive politics and resistance to McCarthyism, and who later formed a theater company. The collection contains correspondence, notes, clippings, and playbills.
corpname_ssm: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
